body:
Well the whole purpose of this patch is to avoid keeping "side-effect databases" like this one. We should make sure that this pass ignores any ops that has the world token (unless we special case some).

Finally, if a list is dead after an append, it is dead right before it as well, so in fact DCE is safe for appends.
body_html:
Well the whole purpose of this patch is to avoid keeping "side-effect databases" like this one. We should make sure that this pass ignores any ops that has the world token (unless we special case some).

Finally, if a list is dead after an append, it is dead right before it as well, so in fact DCE is safe for appends.
body_text:
Well the whole purpose of this patch is to avoid keeping "side-effect databases" like this one. We should make sure that this pass ignores any ops that has the world token (unless we special case some).
Finally, if a list is dead after an append, it is dead right before it as well, so in fact DCE is safe for appends.
